src: Ford accepts the fait accompli with good grace.
mt: Ford bajarilgan ishni yaxshi kayfiyat bilan qabul qiladi.
backtranslation: Ford accepts the work done with a good mood.

src: Falstaff, pleased to find himself not the only dupe, proclaims that all the world is folly, and all are figures of fun ("Tutto nel mondo è burla... Tutti gabbati!... Ma ride ben chi ride La risata final." / "Everything in the world is a jest... but he laughs well who laughs the final laugh").
mt: Falstaff, o'zi yolg'iz aldanmaganini bilib, mamnun bo'lib, butun dunyo ahmoqlik ekanligini va hamma kulgili ekanligini e'lon qiladi ("Tutto nel mondo è burla... Tutti gabbati!... Ma ride ben chi ride La risata final." / "Dunyo hamma narsa hazil... lekin oxirgi kulguni kim kulsa, u yaxshi kuladi").
backtranslation: Falstaff, pleased to know that he is not the only one deceived, declares that the whole world is foolishness and everything is a joke ("Tutto nel mondo è burla... Tutti gabbati!... Ma ride ben chi ride La risata final." / "The world is all a jest... but he who laughs last, laughs best").

src: The entire company repeats his proclamation in an exuberant ten-voice fugue.
mt: Butun kompaniya uning e'lonini o'n ovozli jo'shqin fuga bilan takrorlaydi.
backtranslation: The entire company repeats his announcement with a ten-voiced enthusiastic fugue.

src: They won all their group matches to finish top of the pool.
mt: Ular guruhdagi barcha o'yinlarda g'alaba qozonib, guruhda birinchi o'rinni egalladilar.
backtranslation: They won all the games in the group and took first place in the group.

src: After defeating France in the quarter-finals, they lost to the eventual tournament winners South Africa in the semi-finals.
mt: Chorak finalda Fransiyani mag'lub etgandan so'ng, ular yarim finalda turnirning yakuniy g'olibi bo'lgan Janubiy Afrikaga yutqazishdi.
backtranslation: After defeating France in the final, they lost to South Africa, who became the eventual winner of the tournament, in the semi-final.

src: The arrangement of Thiele and Ladiges was not accepted by George, and was discarded in his 1999 revision.
mt: Tiele va Ladigesning tartibga solinishi Jorj tomonidan qabul qilinmadi va 1999-yildagi qayta koʻrib chiqishda rad etildi.
backtranslation: The regulation of the Tiele and Ladigesning was not accepted by George and was rejected in the 1999 review.

src: Under George's 1999 arrangement, B. epica's placement was as follows:
mt: Jorjning 1999-yildagi tartibiga koʻra, B. epica ning joylashuvi quyidagicha edi:
backtranslation: According to the arrangement of 1999, the location of B. epica was as follows:.

src: The Outsider also grants his mark, and special abilities, to other characters.
mt: Nomaqbul shaxs o'z belgisini va maxsus qobiliyatlarini boshqa personajlarga ham beradi.
backtranslation: An unacceptable person gives their mark and special abilities to other characters.

src: Smith described the character as an amoral figure who grants abilities, but leaves the choice of how to use them up to the recipient.
mt: Smit ushbu personajni qobiliyatlar beruvchi, ammo ulardan qanday foydalanishni oluvchiga qoldiruvchi axloqsiz shaxs sifatida tasvirlagan.
backtranslation: Smith described this character as an immoral person who grants abilities but leaves it to the recipient to decide how to use them.

src: Devil May Cry begins with Dante (Drew Coombs) being attacked in his office by a mysterious woman named Trish (Sara Lafleur).
mt: "Devil May Cry" filmi Dante (Drew Coombs) ofisida Trish (Sara Lafleur) ismli noma'lum ayol tomonidan hujumga uchraganidan boshlanadi.
backtranslation: The film "Devil May Cry" begins with Dante (Drew Coombs) being attacked in his office by an unknown woman named Trish (Sara Lafleur).

src: He impresses her by easily brushing off her assault, and explains that for years, he has hunted demons in pursuit of the ones who killed his mother and brother.
mt: U uning hujumini osonlik bilan qaytarib, uni hayratda qoldiradi va yillar davomida onasi hamda akasini o'ldirgan iblislarni qidirib, ularni ovlaganini tushuntiradi.
backtranslation: He easily repels his attack, leaving him astonished, and explains that he has been searching for and hunting the demons who killed his mother and brother for years.

src: Trish explains that her attack was a test, and that the demon emperor Mundus (Tony Daniels), whom Dante holds responsible for the deaths of his family, is planning to cross over into the human world after centuries of imprisonment.
mt: Trish uning hujumi sinov bo'lganini va Dante o'z oilasining o'limida aybdor deb bilgan iblislar imperatori Mundus (Toni Daniels) asrlar davomida qamoqda bo'lgandan keyin inson dunyosiga o'tishni rejalashtirayotganini tushuntiradi.
backtranslation: Trish explains that her attack was a test and that the Emperor of Demons, Mundus (Toni Daniels), whom Dante holds responsible for his family's death, is planning to cross into the human world after being imprisoned for centuries.

src: Rainbow is a documentary filmmaker.
mt: Rainbow — hujjatli filmlar rejissori.
backtranslation: Rainbow — documentary film director.

src: Liz O'Rourke says she is now working with the mentally disabled (although she is later revealed to be a midwife in the episode "Father Figure").
mt: Liz O'Rourke hozirda aqli zaiflar bilan ishlayotganini aytadi (garchi keyinroq "Ota obrazi" epizodida u акушерka ekanligi ma'lum bo'ladi).
backtranslation: Liz O'Rourke says she is currently working with the mentally disabled (although it is later revealed in the "Father Figure" episode that she is a midwife).

src: Trish Skye says she had problems but has been clean and sober for two years; she works at a funeral home and is a freelance writer.
mt: Trish Skyening aytishicha, u muammolarga duch kelgan, ammo ikki yildan beri giyohvandlik va alkogolizmga qarshi kurashib, toza va hushyor hayot kechirmoqda; u dafn marosimlari uyida ishlaydi va mustaqil yozuvchidir.
backtranslation: According to Trish Skyening, she has faced problems, but for the past two years, she has been fighting against drug addiction and alcoholism, living a clean and sober life; she works at a funeral home and is a freelance writer.

src: Before joining Bernard in Paris, Rosa stays in a flat in London for several weeks.
mt: Bernard bilan Parijda uchrashishdan oldin Rosa bir necha hafta Londondagi kvartirada qoladi.
backtranslation: Before meeting Bernard in Paris, Rosa stays in an apartment in London for several weeks.

src: Now that she has no intention of honouring the agreement of her passport, which was to return to South Africa within a year, she openly introduces herself as Burger's daughter.
mt: Endi u pasportidagi kelishuvga, ya'ni bir yil ichida Janubiy Afrikaga qaytishga rioya qilish niyatida bo'lmagani uchun, u ochiqchasiga o'zini Burgerning qizi deb tanishtiradi.
backtranslation: Due to her intention not to comply with the agreement in her passport, namely to return to South Africa within a year, she openly introduces herself as Burger's daughter.

src: This attracts the attention of the media and she attends several political events.
mt: Bu ommaviy axborot vositalarining e'tiborini tortadi va u bir nechta siyosiy tadbirlarda qatnashadi.
backtranslation: This attracts the attention of the media and participates in several political events.

src: Following Roy Hodgson's appointment, The Sun mocked his rhotacism manner of speech with a "Bwing on the Euwos!" front-page headline.
mt: Roy Hodgson tayinlangandan so'ng, The Sun gazetasi uning "r" harfini talaffuz qilishdagi xatosini "Bwing on the Euwos!" sarlavhasi bilan masxara qildi.
backtranslation: After Roy Hodgson was appointed, The Sun newspaper mocked his mispronunciation of the letter "r" with the headline "Bwing on the Euwos!"

src: The FA called the headline "unacceptable" and more than 100 people complained to the Press Complaints Commission.
mt: Futbol assotsiatsiyasi sarlavhani "nomaqbul" deb atadi va 100 dan ortiq kishi Matbuot shikoyatlari komissiyasiga shikoyat qildi.
backtranslation: The football association called the headline "inappropriate" and over 100 people complained to the Press Complaints Commission.

src: As a response to this, in 2017 boats off the British Columbia coast now have a minimum approach distance of 200 metres compared to the previous 100 metres.
mt: Bunga javoban 2017-yildan boshlab Britaniya Kolumbiyasi qirg'og'ida qayiqlar uchun eng kam masofa 100 metrdan 200 metrgacha oshirildi.
backtranslation: In response, starting from 2017, the minimum distance for boats off the coast of British Columbia was increased from 100 meters to 200 meters.

src: This new rule complements Washington State's minimum approach zone of 180 metres that has been in effect since 2011.
mt: Ushbu yangi qoida 2011-yildan beri amal qilayotgan Vashington shtatining 180 metrli minimal yondashuv zonasini to'ldiradi.
backtranslation: This new rule complements the 180-meter minimum approach zone in Washington State that has been in effect since 2011.

src: If a whale approaches a vessel it must be placed in neutral until the whale passes.
mt: Agar kit kemaga yaqinlashsa, kit o'tib ketguncha uni neytral holatga keltirish kerak.
backtranslation: If a whale approaches the ship, it should be brought to a neutral position until the whale passes.

src: A number of locations in and around Dallas were used in production.
mt: Suratga olish jarayonida Dallas va uning atrofidagi bir qator joylardan foydalanildi.
backtranslation: During the filming process, a number of locations in and around Dallas were used.

src: An office in Renaissance Tower was used for the OCP interior of; the company's exterior is Dallas City Hall, modified with matte paintings to appear taller.
mt: OCP ofisining ichki qismi Renaissance Tower'dagi ofisda tasvirlangan; kompaniyaning tashqi qismi Dallas shahar hokimiyati binosi bo'lib, u balandroq ko'rinishi uchun matli rasmlar bilan o'zgartirilgan.
backtranslation: The interior of the OCP office is depicted in the office at Renaissance Tower; the exterior of the company is the Dallas City Hall building, which has been altered with matte paintings to appear taller.

src: The OCP elevator was that of the Plaza of the Americas.
mt: OCP lifti Plaza of the Americas lifti edi.
backtranslation: OCP elevator Plaza of the Americas elevator.

src: Although the traditional accounts are in agreement that Lydda almost immediately fell into obscurity following the founding of Ramla, narratives vary about the extent of Sulayman's efforts to transfer Lydda's inhabitants to Ramla, some holding that he only demolished a church in Lydda and others that he demolished the city altogether.
mt: An'anaviy manbalar Ramla asos solingandan so'ng Lod deyarli darhol unutilib qolganligi haqida bir xil fikrda bo'lsa-da, Sulaymonning Lod aholisini Ramlaga ko'chirish uchun qilgan sa'y-harakatlari darajasi haqidagi hikoyalar turlicha bo'lib, ba'zilarida u Lodda faqat bir cherkovni vayron qilgan, boshqalarida esa butunlay shaharni vayron qilgan deyiladi.
backtranslation: Although traditional sources agree that Lod was almost immediately forgotten after the founding of Ramla, the stories about the extent of Solomon's efforts to move the inhabitants of Lod to Ramla vary, with some saying he only destroyed a church in Lod, while others claim he completely destroyed the city.

src: Al-Ya'qubi (d. 839) noted Sulayman razed the houses of Lydda's inhabitants to force their relocation to Ramla and punished those who resisted.
mt: Al-Ya'qubiy (vafoti 839-yil) Sulaymon Lidda aholisining uylarini buzib, ularni Ramlaga ko'chirishga majburlaganini va qarshilik ko'rsatganlarni jazolaganini qayd etgan.
backtranslation: Al-Ya'qubiy (died in 839) noted that Sulaymon demolished the houses of the people of Lidda and forced them to move to Ramla, punishing those who resisted.

src: In the words of al-Jahshiyari, Sulayman "founded the town of al-Ramla and its mosque and thus caused the ruin of Lod
mt: Al-Jahshiyoriyning soʻzlariga koʻra, Sulaymon "al-Ramla shahrini va uning masjidini qurdirgan va shu tariqa Lodning vayron boʻlishiga sabab boʻlgan"
backtranslation: According to Al-Jahshiyori, Solomon "built the city of al-Ramla and its mosque, thereby causing the destruction of Lod."

src: Rolling Stone includes the album and several songs on various "best of" lists, such as:
mt: Rolling Stone albumni va bir nechta qo'shiqni turli "eng yaxshi" ro'yxatlariga kiritgan, masalan:
backtranslation: Rolling Stone included the album and several songs in various "best" lists, for example:.

src: The Tactical Patrol Force (TPF) of the New York City Police Department arrived to free the police trapped inside the Stonewall.
mt: Nyu-York shahar politsiya boshqarmasining Taktik patrul kuchlari (TPF) Stonewall ichida qamalib qolgan politsiyachilarni ozod qilish uchun yetib keldi.
backtranslation: The Tactical Patrol Force (TPF) of the New York City Police Department arrived to free the officers trapped inside Stonewall.

src: One officer's eye was cut and a few others were bruised from being struck by flying debris.
mt: Bir ofitserning ko'zi kesilgan, bir necha nafari esa uchib kelgan qoldiqlar urishi natijasida jarohat olgan.
backtranslation: An officer's eye was cut, and several others were injured as a result of being hit by flying debris.

src: Bob Kohler, who was walking his dog by the Stonewall that night, saw the TPF arrive:
mt: O'sha kuni kechasi Stonewall yonida itini sayr qildirayotgan Bob Kohler TPF kelganini ko'rdi:
backtranslation: That night, Bob Kohler, who was walking his dog near Stonewall, saw the TPF arrive.

src: Waziri and Afonja save Tawa.
mt: Vaziri va Afonja Tavoni qutqaradi.
backtranslation: The minister and Afonja Tavoni will save.

src: Waziri subsequently presents his account of the investigation to the British, who instruct him to withhold Aderopo's identity; he reluctantly agrees to do so for the sake of a peaceful independence.
mt: Vaziri keyinroq tergov hisobotini britaniyaliklarga taqdim qiladi va ular unga Aderoponing shaxsini oshkor qilmaslikni buyuradi; u tinch yo'l bilan mustaqillikka erishish uchun bu ishni qilishga majbur bo'ladi.
backtranslation: The minister will later present the investigation report to the British, and they order him not to disclose Aderopo's identity; he will have to do this to achieve independence peacefully.

src: Diller planned on a new Star Trek series forming the cornerstone for a new television network.
mt: Diller yangi televideniye tarmog'ining asosiy toshi bo'ladigan yangi "Star Trek" serialini rejalashtirgan.
backtranslation: The dealers planned a new "Star Trek" series that will be the cornerstone of the new television network.

src: Though Paramount was reluctant to abandon its work on the film, Roddenberry wanted to bring many of the production staff from the original series to work on the new show, titled Star Trek: Phase II.
mt: Paramount film ustida ishlashdan voz kechishga tayyor bo'lmasa-da, Roddenberry original serialdagi ko'plab ijodiy guruh a'zolarini "Star Trek: Phase II" nomli yangi shouda ishlashga taklif qilmoqchi edi.
backtranslation: Although not ready to refuse to work on the Paramount film, Roddenberry intended to invite many members of the original series' creative team to work on a new show called "Star Trek: Phase II."

src: Chilean devil ray (M. tarapacana)
mt: Chili iblis nuri (M. tarapacana)
backtranslation: Chili devil's light (M. tarapacana).

src: Cory Edwards chose to approach the film predominantly as an action/comedy, instead of as a typical animated film, and wrote the script to appeal to audiences of any age like many of the films produced by Pixar or Disney.
mt: Kori Edvards filmga tipik animatsion film o'rniga asosan jangari/komediya janrida yondashishni tanladi va ssenariyni Pixar yoki Disney tomonidan suratga olingan ko'plab filmlar kabi har qanday yoshdagi tomoshabinlarga yoqishi uchun yozdi.
backtranslation: Kori Edwards chose to approach the film primarily in the action/comedy genre instead of a typical animated film and wrote the script to appeal to audiences of all ages, similar to many films produced by Pixar or Disney.

src: Bugs Bunny, Road Runner, The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle and Friends, The Muppets, The Simpsons and The Incredibles (2004) have all been cited as inspirations for the film.
mt: Filmga ilhom manbai boʻlgan asarlar qatorida Bugs Bunny, Road Runner, The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle and Friends, The Muppets, The Simpsons va The Incredibles (2004) kabi asarlar tilga olingan.
backtranslation: Among the works that inspired the film are mentioned Bugs Bunny, Road Runner, The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle and Friends, The Muppets, The Simpsons, and The Incredibles (2004).

src: By the early 1930s, Orizaba's typical route had remained virtually the same, though Nassau and Tampico were dropped as ports of call.
mt: 1930-yillarning boshlariga kelib, Orizaba kemasining odatiy yo'nalishi deyarli o'zgarmagan edi, garchi Nassau va Tampiko qo'nish portlari ro'yxatidan olib tashlangan edi.
backtranslation: By the early 1930s, the usual route of the Orizaba ship had hardly changed, although the ports of call in Nassau and Tampico had been removed from the list.

src: It was in this period that American poet Hart Crane leapt to his death from Orizaba.
mt: Xuddi shu davrda amerikalik shoir Xart Kreyn Orizabadan sakrab o'zini o'ldirgan.
backtranslation: During the same period, the American poet Hart Crane jumped from Orizaba and killed himself.

src: At around noon on 27 April 1932, while the ship was headed to New York—some 275 miles (443 km) north of Havana and 10 miles (16 km) off the Florida coast—Crane, clad in pajamas and overcoat, climbed the rail at the stern of the ship and plunged into the ocean.
mt: 1932-yil 27-aprel kuni tushga yaqin, kema Nyu-York sari suzib ketayotganda, Gavana shimolidan taxminan 275 mil (443 km) va Florida qirg'og'idan 10 mil (16 km) uzoqlikda, Crane, pidjak va palto kiyib, kemaning kormasiga ko'tarilib, okeanga sakrab tushdi.
backtranslation: On April 27, 1932, near noon, as the ship was sailing towards New York, approximately 275 miles (443 km) north of Havana and 10 miles (16 km) from the Florida coast, Crane, wearing pajamas and a coat, climbed to the stern of the ship and jumped into the ocean.

src: How you use your eyes, your position, and how you maximize camera angles... I didn't know those things before."
mt: Ko'zlaringizni qanday ishlatishingiz, holatingiz va kamera burchaklarini qanday maksimal darajada ishlatishingiz... Men bularni ilgari bilmasdim.
backtranslation: How you use your eyes, your posture, and how you maximize camera angles... I didn't know these things before...

src: To prepare for the role of a courtesan, she learned different styles of ballroom dances and trained in pole dance for three months.
mt: Saroy ayoli roliga tayyorgarlik ko'rish uchun u turli uslubdagi balli raqslarni o'rgangan va uch oy davomida pole dance bilan shug'ullangan.
backtranslation: To prepare for the role of a palace woman, she learned various styles of ballroom dancing and practiced pole dancing for three months.

src: Critic Julia
mt: Kritik Julia
backtranslation: Criticize Julia.

src: On August 26, George H. W. Bush toured devastated areas of Louisiana with Governor Edwin Edwards.
mt: 26-avgustda Jorj H. V. Bush gubernator Edvin Edvards bilan birga Luiziananing vayron boʻlgan hududlarini koʻzdan kechirdi.
backtranslation: On August 26, George H. W. Bush, along with Governor Edwin Edwards, inspected the devastated areas of Louisiana.

src: President Bush remarked, "The destruction from this storm goes beyond anything we have known in recent years," but noted that damage was less severe than in Florida.
mt: Prezident Bush: "Bu bo'roning keltirgan vayronagarchiliklari so'nggi yillarda guvohi bo'lganlarimizdan ancha katta", - dedi, biroq zarar Floridadagidan kamroq ekanligini ta'kidladi.
backtranslation: President Bush: "The destruction caused by this storm is much greater than what we have witnessed in recent years," he said, but noted that the damage is less than in Florida.

src: After his visit to Louisiana, President Bush declared only Terrebonne Parish as a disaster area, but later included 34 other parishes under this declaration.
mt: Luisianaga tashrifidan so'ng prezident Bush faqat Terrebonne okrugini ofatli hudud deb e'lon qildi, ammo keyinroq bu e'longa yana 34 ta okrugni ham kiritdi.
backtranslation: After visiting Louisiana, President Bush declared only Terrebonne Parish a disaster area, but later included an additional 34 parishes in this declaration.

src: When general elections were held in July 2003, the CPP won, while FUNCINPEC polled 20.8 percent of the popular vote and secured 26 out of a total of 120 parliamentary seats.
mt: 2003-yil iyul oyida umumiy saylovlar oʻtkazilganda, CPP gʻalaba qozondi, FUNCINPEC esa ovozlarning 20,8 foizini olib, 120 oʻrinli parlamentda 26 oʻrinni qoʻlga kiritdi.
backtranslation: In the general elections held in July 2003, the CPP won, while FUNCINPEC received 20.8% of the votes, securing 26 seats in the 120-seat parliament.

src: This marked an 11 percentage point drop in FUNCINPEC's share of the popular vote compared with 1998.
mt: Bu 1998-yilga nisbatan FUNCINPECning umumxalq ovozlaridagi ulushining 11 foiz punktga tushganini bildiradi.
backtranslation: This indicates that FUNCINPEC's share of the popular vote has decreased by 11 percentage points compared to 1998.

src: Palaces are usually arranged around one or more courtyards, with their façades facing inwards; some examples are adorned with sculpture.
mt: Saroylar odatda bir yoki bir nechta hovlilar atrofida qurilgan bo'lib, ularning jabhalari ichkariga qaratilgan; ba'zi misollar haykallar bilan bezatilgan.
backtranslation: Palaces are usually built around one or more courtyards, with their facades facing inward; some examples are adorned with sculptures.

src: Some palaces possess associated hieroglyphic descriptions that identify them as the royal residences of named rulers.
mt: Ba'zi saroylar nomlari tilga olingan hukmdorlarning qirollik qarorgohlari ekanligini ko'rsatuvchi hieroglif tasvirlarga ega.
backtranslation: Some palace names have hieroglyphic depictions indicating that they were royal residences of the mentioned rulers.

src: The Inquisition post mortem held after Minsterworth's execution casts light upon his land-holding, much of which was held directly off John of Gaunt, son of King Edward III.
mt: Minsteruortni qatl etishdan keyin o'tkazilgan o'limdan keyingi inkvizitsiya uning yer egaligiga oydinlik kiritadi, uning ko'p qismi bevosita qirol Edvard III ning o'g'li Jon of Gauntga tegishli edi.
backtranslation: The post-mortem inquisition conducted after the minister's murder sheds light on his land ownership, much of which belonged directly to King Edward III's son, John of Gaunt.

src: This was particularly concentrated in the southwest of England.
mt: Bu, ayniqsa, Angliyaning janubi-g'arbida to'plangan edi.
backtranslation: This was especially concentrated in the southwest of England.

src: Daniel feels ignored by his father, who has chosen Alexis to be his best man.
mt: Daniel otasi uni e'tiborsiz qoldirayotganini his qilmoqda, chunki otasi Alexisni bosh enagasi etib tanlagan.
backtranslation: Daniel feels that his father is ignoring him because his father has chosen Alexis as the head nanny.

src: Christina McKinney (Ashley Jensen), MODE's seamstress, reunites with her husband Stuart (Derek Riddell) after leaving him in Scotland years ago; he reveals he is dying of a rare disease which requires a $100,000 operation.
mt: MODE'ning tikuvchisi Kristiana Makkinni (Eshli Jensen) yillar avval Shotlandiyada qoldirib ketgan eri Styuart (Derek Riddell) bilan qayta uchrashadi; Styuart o'limga olib keladigan kam uchraydigan kasallikka chalinganini va unga 100 000 dollarlik operatsiya kerakligini aytadi.
backtranslation: Fashion designer Kristiana McKinney (Ashley Jensen) reunites with her husband Stuart (Derek Riddell), whom she left in Scotland years ago; Stuart reveals that he has a rare terminal illness and needs a $100,000 surgery.

src: Mistress Quickly rushes in, shouting that Ford has returned home unexpectedly with a retinue of henchmen to catch his wife's lover.
mt: Xizmatkor ayol Quickly yugurib kirib, Fordning xotinining sevgilisini ushlab olmoq uchun kutilmaganda bir guruh yordamchilari bilan uyga qaytganini baqirib aytadi.
backtranslation: The maid quickly runs in and shouts that Ford's wife unexpectedly returned home with a group of assistants to catch her lover.

src: Falstaff hides first behind the screen, but realizes that Ford will likely look for him there.
mt: Falstaff avvaliga parda ortiga yashirinadi, lekin Ford ehtimol uni u yerda qidirishini tushunadi.
backtranslation: Falstaff initially hides behind the curtain, but Ford realizes he might search for him there.

src: The women urge him to hide in the laundry basket, which he does.
mt: Ayollar uni kir yuvish savatiga yashirinishga undaydi va u shunday qiladi.
backtranslation: The women urge him to hide in the laundry basket, and he does so.

src: In that year he was seen by Arthur Sullivan and, separately, by W. S. Gilbert, in performances of their one-act comic opera Trial by Jury.
mt: O'sha yili u Arthur Sullivan va alohida ravishda W. S. Gilbert tomonidan ularning bir pardali komik operasi bo'lgan "Sud" (Trial by Jury) asarining ijrolarida ko'rilgan.
backtranslation: That year, he was seen in performances of "Trial by Jury," a one-act comic opera by Arthur Sullivan and separately by W. S. Gilbert.

src: Impressed, they engaged him to play the comic lead in their new, full-length work, The Sorcerer.
mt: Ta'sirlangan ular uni yangi, to'liq metrajli asari "Sehrgar"da komik bosh rolni ijro etishga taklif qilishdi.
backtranslation: They invited him to play the comedic lead role in their new full-length work "The Magician."

src: Thereafter, Grossmith created the leading comic role in each of Gilbert and Sullivan's long-running comic operas until The Yeomen of the Guard, which closed in 1889.
mt: Shundan so'ng, Grossmit Gilbert va Sullivanlarning 1889-yil yopilgan "The Yeomen of the Guard"gacha bo'lgan uzoq davom etgan komik operalarining har birida yetakchi komik rolini ijro etdi.
backtranslation: After that, Grossmit played the leading comic role in each of Gilbert and Sullivan's long-running comic operas up to "The Yeomen of the Guard," which closed in 1889.

src: While returning home, Sudeep kidnaps and strangles Nani to death, making his death look like an accident.
mt: Uyga qaytayotganda, Sudeep Nanini o'g'irlab, boğazını sıkarak öldürür ve ölümünü kaza gibi gösterir.
backtranslation: On the way home, Sudeep kidnaps Nanini, strangles her to death, and makes it look like an accident.

src: Before dying, Nani curses Sudeep, swearing to kill Sudeep if he tries to hurt Bindu.
mt: O'lishidan oldin Nani Sudeepni la'natlaydi va agar u Binduga zarar yetkazishga urinsa, uni o'ldirishga qasam ichadi.
backtranslation: Before dying, Nani curses Sudeep and vows to kill him if he tries to harm Bindu.

src: Unaware of the incident, Bindu confesses her love for the dying Nani by phone; it is the last thing Nani hears before he dies.
mt: Hodisadan bexabar boʻlgan Bindu oʻlayotgan Naniga telefon orqali sevgisini izhor qiladi; bu Nani oʻlmasdan oldin eshitgan oxirgi narsadir.
backtranslation: Unaware of the situation, Bindu expresses her love to the dying Nani over the phone; this is the last thing Nani hears before passing away.

src: When Amir does not return, Tati and her aunt are worried: as Tati saw Amir with Omi, she fears that the two have run away together.
mt: Amir qaytib kelmagach, Tati va uning xolasi xavotirga tushishadi: Tati Amírni Omi bilan birga koʻrganligi uchun, ikkisi birga qochib ketganidan qoʻrqadi.
backtranslation: When Amir does not return, Tati and her aunt become worried: because Tati saw Amir with Omi, she fears that the two of them have run away together.

src: Heartbroken, she intends to return to Cigading.
mt: Yuragi ezilgan holda, u Sigadingga qaytishni niyat qiladi.
backtranslation: With a crushed spirit, he intends to return to Sigading.

src: The rare formal social events in the Pooters' lives are particular magnets for misfortune.
mt: Puterlar hayotidagi kamdan-kam uchraydigan rasmiy ijtimoiy tadbirlar, ayniqsa, baxtsizlikni o'ziga jalb qiladi.
backtranslation: The rare official social events in the lives of the Puterlars especially attract misfortune.

src: They receive an invitation from the Lord Mayor of London to attend a ball at the Mansion House for "Representatives of Trade and Commerce".
mt: Ular London meri nomasidan "Savdo va tijorat vakillari" uchun Mansion House'da bo'lib o'tadigan balga taklif oladilar.
backtranslation: They receive an invitation to the ball held at Mansion House in London on behalf of "Trade and Commerce Representatives."

src: †Mammuthus primigenius (woolly mammoth)
mt: †Mammuthus primigenius (junli mamont)
backtranslation: †Mammuthus primigenius (woolly mammoth).
